thread.title: Bodies of mom, teen daughter found in Florida apartment | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Bodies of mom, teen daughter found in Florida apartment | Daily Mail Online

author: Jordan Gass-Poore For Dailymail.Com
title: Bodies of mom, teen daughter found in Florida apartment | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Bodies of a mom and her teen daughter found inside a Florida apartment after an almost five-hour police standoff with a man inside Kevin Nelson, 32, was arrested around 3:45pm after a standoff with Sunrise police at his Del Rio Village apartment The incident started when neighbors called police to report gunfire around 11am Police found the bodies of Karen Lyle, 40, and her 15-year-old daughter Shanice Smith inside Nelson's home They both died from gunshot wounds, police say Published: 05:10 GMT, 14 February 2017 | Updated: 09:56 GMT, 14 February 2017 9 shares
